projects.name: Angel Stadium
projects.equipment: Fujitec; KONE; Dover; Montgomery; Amtech; National Wheel-O-Vator; Pflow Industries
projects.description: Home of the Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim Baseball Club. On maintenance since 2004, service elevator #1 was modernized using Fujitec Viridian equipment in 2014.

projects.name: Beverly Hills Hotel
projects.description: Iconic hotel went through a major renovation in 1994. Fujitec provided the elevator equipment and has had it on maintenance since.

projects.name: One Franklin Square
projects.description: With only 12 stories, One Franklin Square is the 5th tallest building in DC. The Washington Post headquarters relocated here in 2015.

projects.name: Dreese Hall
projects.description: Classroom building/lab for The Ohio State University.  Five cars were modernized by Fujitec 2017/2018, with a total of 119 units on service throughout the OSU campus.

projects.name: Fountain Place
projects.description: Original Fujitec install in the late 1980’s on service in the central business district of downtown Dallas.

projects.name: Great American Ballpark
projects.description: Home of the Cincinnati Reds.  Fujitec installed the original equipment and has serviced GABP since its first season in 2003.

projects.name: New York Times
projects.description: Located on the west side of Midtown Manhattan and near Times Square, the New York Times Tower is the headquarters building of The New York Times.  The 51-story structure, rising 1,050 feet, was designed by the famous architect Renzo Piano, who also designed the Kansai International Airport in Japan.

projects.name: Rowes Wharf/Residences at Rowes Wharf/ Boston Harbor Hotel
projects.description: Known for its unique multi-story arch over the public plaza between Atlantic Avenue and the Boston Harbor, Rowes Wharf rests on the waterfront near numerous restaurants and a hub of entertainment options for tourists.

projects.name: Bank of America
projects.description: Awarded in 2017, Dallas’ tallest building is undergoing a modernization that includes 24 Double-Decker units that will implement Fujitec’s state-of-the-art Group Supervisory Dispatch with AI.

projects.name: Two International Place
projects.description: Located on the formerly known site of Fort Hill, Two International was completed in 1992 and is the 10th tallest building in Boston.

projects.name: Center at 600 Vine
projects.description: Office tower in the heart of downtown Cincinnati. Enjoy a premium location near numerous restaurants and local attractions. Vine was installed with original Fujitec equipment in early 1980’s.

projects.name: Tower at Cityplace
projects.description: Current project scope includes the modernization of 30 elevators

projects.name: Urban Towers
projects.description: Modernized with Fujitec Viridian controllers

projects.name: 1400 Smith
projects.description: Formerly the headquarters of Enron, Chevron now owns and occupies the 50 story building. Modernization work began in 2013 and was completed in 2015.

projects.name: Music Hall
projects.description: Cincinnati Music Hall is a music performance center completed in 1878.  The modernization included the removal 4 escalators and installation of 2 new escalators and 5 elevators.

projects.name: Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia Ambulatory Care
projects.description: This prestigious children's hospital is one of the leading pediatric centers in the United States. Many designs provide the facility with uniqueness and warmth such as the children's palm-print patterns used to decorate the glass wall of the elevator cab interior.

projects.name: Soldier Field
projects.description: Home to the Chicago Bears

projects.name: Paul Brown Stadium
projects.description: First Season 2000

projects.name: Great American Ballpark
projects.description: Home of the Cincinnati Reds.  Fujitec installed the original equipment and has serviced GABP since its first season in 2003.

projects.name: Dayton Children’s Hospital
projects.description: Ranked as one of the top Children’s hospitals in America, DCH cares for over 200,000 patients a year.

projects.name: New Meadowlands
projects.description: Fujitec awarded the new installation for new stadium

projects.name: National Music Centre
projects.description: The National Music Centre in Calgary, Canada is a facility that supports all aspects of music in Canada, including performances, collaborations, and the development of stronger relationships within communities across the country.

projects.name: Pyramid 57
projects.description: VIA 57 West is an approximately 140m high residential building on the waterfront of the Hudson River in Manhattan. The building has a distinctive giant pyramid appearance. The hollowed-out portion of the building's face allows space for a courtyard and allows sunlight to spread into the interior.

projects.name: Sky
projects.description: High End Residential use on the west side of midtown Manhattan completed in 2016.

projects.name: Dubai International Airport
projects.description: These facilities are served by eight "SKYTRAIN" observation elevators, the world’s largest passenger capacity observation elevator model. With a capacity of nine tons and 120 passengers, these elevators smoothly transport a large number of people from around the world.

projects.name: The Centre Government Complex (Tamar)
projects.description: Located in the central district of Hong Kong, this complex consists of an arch-like government office building to resemble the Triumphal Arch in Paris, symbolizing Hong Kong's open door policy "open politics to the citizen" and "multi-cultures." The legislative council, parliament house and office buildings became a new landmark of the city.

projects.name: Hana Financial Group Integrated Data Center
projects.description: Hana Financial Group Integrated Data Center is a global data center of Hana Financial Group. EZSHUTTLE (Destination Floor Guidance System or DFGS) was applied to 6 units.

projects.name: Korea Design Center
projects.description: The Korea Design Center is a strikingly innovative glass-clad building built in Seongnam-City, Kyunggi-do, in southern Seoul. With eight floors above ground and four below, the Center consists of offices and exhibition halls.

projects.name: Kuala Lumpur Convention Centre
projects.description: The Kuala Lumpur Convention Centre is located in downtown Kuala Lumpur, as a leading international conference hall in Malaysia. Fujitec products are widely used in the Centre where international conferences are attended by people from around the world.

projects.name: Miramar Entertainment Park
projects.description: In Taipei City, Miramar Entertainment Park is a large-scale retail shopping and entertainment venue. Additionally, a Ferris wheel located on the top of the building commands a full view of the city.

projects.name: The Imperial Parliament Building of Germany
projects.description: The Imperial Parliament Building (Reichstag) in Berlin is the central facility of the House of Parliament in the Republic of Germany.

projects.name: Marina One
projects.description: The total project consists of 2 office blocks of 30-stories, 2 residential blocks of 34-stories, a commercial retail podium and a green garden at the center of the development. The project is surrounded by some of the most recognizable developments in Singapore such as Marina Bay Sands, Singapore Flyer, Esplanade Theatres On The Bay and Gardens By The Bay.
